instruction: Create a new recipe for an easy and healthy breakfast.
output:
This recipe for a healthy and easy breakfast takes only minutes to prepare. You'll need the following: one ripe banana, half a cup of rolled oats, one tablespoon of honey, one teaspoon of cinnamon, one cup of almond milk, and one cup of fresh berries. 

Start by mashing the banana in a bowl. Once done, add the oats, honey, cinnamon and almond milk and stir until combined. 

Fill a small skillet with a teaspoon of oil and heat to medium. Depending on the desired texture, leave the mixture to cook for 3-5 minutes. Add the desired amount of berries and stir in the mixture. 

Remove skillet from heat and serve in a bowl. Enjoy your delicious, healthy breakfast!
